Financial Transparency/Open Government
======================================

Welcome to the City of Lancaster’s Financial Transparency Section

The City of Lancaster is committed to being transparent with its citizens. Here you will find dedicated pages for five distinct transparency areas: Traditional Finances, Contracts and Procurement, Economic Development, Public Pensions, and Debt Obligations.

These five key areas help provide clear and meaningful financial information that go beyond the traditional accounting statements and reports. Within each section, there are summaries, visualizations, downloadable data, documents, and other relevant information in a user-friendly format to help citizens gain a better understanding of their City’s financial status.
